General.Name: Chengdu Gas Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Gas Group Corporation Ltd. engages in the urban gas supply business in China. As of December 31, 2021, it operated a pipeline network of 9,870.33 kilometers, 19 gas storage and gas distribution stations, 5 gas filling stations, and 18,400 pressure regulation facilities serving approximately 3.11 million resident customers. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Gas Company. Chengdu Gas Group Corporation Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Chengdu, China.
